title: What are the most liked Indian videos on YouTube? - Quora

response.answer_text: Carryminati's Yalgaar breaks the record of all time Most Liked Video in India with 10 Million+ Likes.  1st Indian video to cross 10 Million Likes.(Since carry’s YouTube vs Tiktok video has deleted and it will never come back again) This video has entered in the list of Top 20 most-viewed online videos in first 24 hours. Before Yalgaar- Carryminati broke the record of Most Liked Video In India with 10.3 Million+ Likes breaking the previous record of song Filhall (6.6m Likes).  Some of the Milestones created through this video are… Most Subscribers gained in 24 hours (1.8 Million)Fastest Video to Reach 1M Likes(1.5 hr)Fastest Video to Reach 2M Likes(4 hr)2nd Most Liked video in the World in first 24 hours. (5.2m)Most Comments On Video (797k+)It also broke down the record to reach fastest 3m, 4m & 5m Likes. Update: This Video has become 1st Indian Video To Cross 10 Million Likes. Also Carry has gained 7 Million subscribers post this video.  Basically this video was a roasting reply to a Tiktoker Amir who compared Youtube with TikTok and placed TikTok over Youtube. But little did he know, that roasting king of India will give him such a befitting reply which would shut down all the Tiktokers. Here is the list Of previously Most Liked Indian Videos On Youtube.  Edit 1: This video has been temporarily Removed by YouTube for violating its policy. But the title of ‘Most Liked Video’ still remains with Carryminati as he uploaded a respond video over it “Stop Making Assumption,YouTube Vs TikTok” which has gained over 7.7m+ likes as of now. Edit 2: Yalgaar has become the Most Liked Video in India now. Here is the list of India's Most Disliked Video on YouTube and the record is held by None other than Tiktoker Mr. Faisu. Yogesh Gola's answer to Which is India's most disliked video in YouTube?

Since the YouTube channel is the name of his Vevo account, it may rather be counted as Pakistani video rather than Indian. Though the rankings may change anytime soon.
